name: Montana Mike (ZX Spectrum Next) Digital Download
name_original: Montana Mike (ZX Spectrum Next) Digital Download
description:
Mike is on a mission to recover rare lost treasures around the world for his father's history museum.

Fly around the globe via Indy Air to various uncharted tombs and catacombs to retrieve the items.

Our intrepid explorer will travel to far flung places from Mexico to China and meet many foes.

Courage, a trusty whip and sidearm are all you have to survive the adventure.

Good Luck!

Features:

* Explore lost jungle tombs & catacombs.
* Find rare treasures.
* Many themed levels.
* Avoid fiendish traps & hazards.
* Retro pixel graphics.
* Platform fun gameplay.

Visit us:

www.spectrumnextgames.com
